alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Iron; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iron, southwestern Houghton and southwestern Baraga Counties through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 543 PM EDT/443 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Kenton, or 15 miles north of Iron River. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Iron, southwestern Houghton and southwestern Baraga Counties, including the following locations... Gibbs City and Paint Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
